title: Celestial Stone
summaries: The Celestial Stone is a Hardmode post-Golem accessory crafted from a Moon Stone and a Sun Stone at the Tinkerer's Workshop. It offers the same boosts as its components do, and as such, it is active during both day and night. It can be combined with the Moon Shell to form a Celestial Shell.

• +10% melee speed
  • +10% damage (all types)
  • +2% critical strike chance
  • +1 HP/s life regeneration
  • +4 defense
  • +15% mining speed
  • +0.5 minion knockback
